body: kind of -- we have to do the static_cast to Variable otherwise pybind tries to convert the tensors, and at::Tensor conversion doesn't work if the tensor is a Variable. I'd like to be able to drop the static_cast's but we are waiting for tensor/variable to merge to make it happen.
body_html: kind of -- we have to do the static_cast to Variable otherwise pybind tries to convert the tensors, and at::Tensor conversion doesn't work if the tensor is a Variable. I'd like to be able to drop the static_cast's but we are waiting for tensor/variable to merge to make it happen.
body_text: kind of -- we have to do the static_cast to Variable otherwise pybind tries to convert the tensors, and at::Tensor conversion doesn't work if the tensor is a Variable. I'd like to be able to drop the static_cast's but we are waiting for tensor/variable to merge to make it happen.
